select.id: get特別徴収帳票データの取得

mapper.select: SELECT koumokuGoukey."hokenryoDankai", koumokuGoukey."yoGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "yoGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."goGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "goGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."rokuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "rokuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."nanaGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "nanaGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."hatiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "hatiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."kyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "kyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."jyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "jyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."jyuitiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "jyuitiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."jyuniGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "jyuniGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."itiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "itiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."niGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "niGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."sanGetuNinsuuGoukeyi" AS "sanGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."現年随時の人数合計" AS "現年随時の人数合計", koumokuGoukey."過年度の人数合計" AS "過年度の人数合計", koumokuGoukey."歳出還付の人数合計" AS "歳出還付の人数合計", koumokuGoukey."該当段階の人数合計" AS "該当段階の人数合計", koumokuGoukey."総人数合計" AS "総人数合計", koumokuGoukey."yoGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "yoGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."goGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "goGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."rokuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "rokuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."nanaGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "nanaGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."hatiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "hatiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."kyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "kyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."jyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "jyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."jyuitiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "jyuitiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."jyuniGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "jyuniGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."itiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "itiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."niGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "niGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."sanGetuKinkakuGoukeyi" AS "sanGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", koumokuGoukey."現年随時の金額合計" AS "現年随時の金額合計", koumokuGoukey."過年度の金額合計" AS "過年度の金額合計", koumokuGoukey."歳出還付の金額合計" AS "歳出還付の金額合計", koumokuGoukey."該当段階の金額合計" AS "該当段階の金額合計" FROM "TmpKoumokuGoukey_Ichi" AS koumokuGoukey WHERE koumokuGoukey."choshuHouhou" = '1' ORDER BY koumokuGoukey."hokenryoDankai"

select.id: get合計帳票データの取得

mapper.select: SELECT gokeyBubunKoumoku."hokenryoDankai", gokeyBubunKoumoku."yoGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."goGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."rokuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."nanaGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."hatiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."kyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."jyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."jyuitiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."jyuniGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."itiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."niGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."sanGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."現年随時の人数合計", gokeyBubunKoumoku."過年度の人数合計", gokeyBubunKoumoku."歳出還付の人数合計", gokeyBubunKoumoku."該当段階の人数合計", gokeyBubunKoumoku."総人数合計", gokeyBubunKoumoku."yoGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."goGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."rokuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."nanaGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."hatiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."kyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."jyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."jyuitiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."jyuniGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."itiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."niGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."sanGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", gokeyBubunKoumoku."現年随時の金額合計", gokeyBubunKoumoku."過年度の金額合計", gokeyBubunKoumoku."歳出還付の金額合計", gokeyBubunKoumoku."該当段階の金額合計", gokeyBubunKoumoku."総金額合計" FROM "TmpGokeyBubunKoumoku_Ichi" AS gokeyBubunKoumoku ORDER BY gokeyBubunKoumoku."hokenryoDankai"

select.id: get減免帳票データの取得

mapper.select: SELECT gemmenJyoho."hokenryoDankai", gemmenJyoho."hokenryoDankaiKanendoNinsu", gemmenJyoho."hoDankaiKanendoGemmenGaku", gemmenJyoho."hoDankaiKanendoNinsuGoukeyi", gemmenJyoho."hoDankaiKanendoGemenGakuGoukei" FROM "TmpGemmenJyoho_Ichi" AS gemmenJyoho WHERE gemmenJyoho."choteiNendo" IS NULL AND gemmenJyoho."fukaNendo" IS NULL ORDER BY gemmenJyoho."hokenryoDankai"

select.id: get被保険者台帳管理と宛名のデータ

mapper.select: SELECT "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi".* FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi"
SELECT kayigoJyoho.* FROM "TmpKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho

select.id: get項目小計一時テーブルデータの取得

mapper.select: SELECT koumokuSyoukeyi."hokenryoDankai", koumokuSyoukeyi."choshuHouhou", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."yoGetuNinsu") AS "yoGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."goGetuNinsu") AS "goGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."rokuGetuNinsu") AS "rokuGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."nanaGetuNinsu") AS "nanaGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."hatiGetuNinsu") AS "hatiGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."kyuGetuNinsu") AS "kyuGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuGetuNinsu") AS "jyuGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuitiGetuNinsu") AS "jyuitiGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuniGetuNinsu") AS "jyuniGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."itiGetuNinsu") AS "itiGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."niGetuNinsu") AS "niGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."sanGetuNinsu") AS "sanGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."gennenSuyijiNinsu") AS "gennenSuyijiNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."kanendoNinsu") AS "kanendoNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."sayisyutuKanpuNinsu") AS "sayisyutuKanpuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."yoGetuKinkaku") AS "yoGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."goGetuKinkaku") AS "goGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."rokuGetuKinkaku") AS "rokuGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."nanaGetuKinkaku") AS "nanaGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."hatiGetuKinkaku") AS "hatiGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."kyuGetuKinkaku") AS "kyuGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuGetuKinkaku") AS "jyuGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuitiGetuKinkaku") AS "jyuitiGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuniGetuKinkaku") AS "jyuniGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."itiGetuKinkaku") AS "itiGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."niGetuKinkaku") AS "niGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."sanGetuKinkaku") AS "sanGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."gennenSuyijiKinkaku") AS "gennenSuyijiKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."kanendoKinkaku") AS "kanendoKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."sayisyutuKanpuKinkaku") AS "sayisyutuKanpuKinkaku" FROM "TmpKoumokuSyoukeyi_Ichi" AS koumokuSyoukeyi GROUP BY koumokuSyoukeyi."choshuHouhou", koumokuSyoukeyi."hokenryoDankai"

select.id: get項目小計一時テーブル合計データの取得

mapper.select: SELECT koumokuSyoukeyi."choshuHouhou", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."yoGetuNinsu") AS "yoGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."goGetuNinsu") AS "goGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."rokuGetuNinsu") AS "rokuGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."nanaGetuNinsu") AS "nanaGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."hatiGetuNinsu") AS "hatiGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."kyuGetuNinsu") AS "kyuGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuGetuNinsu") AS "jyuGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuitiGetuNinsu") AS "jyuitiGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuniGetuNinsu") AS "jyuniGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."itiGetuNinsu") AS "itiGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."niGetuNinsu") AS "niGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."sanGetuNinsu") AS "sanGetuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."gennenSuyijiNinsu") AS "gennenSuyijiNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."kanendoNinsu") AS "kanendoNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."sayisyutuKanpuNinsu") AS "sayisyutuKanpuNinsu", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."yoGetuKinkaku") AS "yoGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."goGetuKinkaku") AS "goGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."rokuGetuKinkaku") AS "rokuGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."nanaGetuKinkaku") AS "nanaGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."hatiGetuKinkaku") AS "hatiGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."kyuGetuKinkaku") AS "kyuGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuGetuKinkaku") AS "jyuGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuitiGetuKinkaku") AS "jyuitiGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."jyuniGetuKinkaku") AS "jyuniGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."itiGetuKinkaku") AS "itiGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."niGetuKinkaku") AS "niGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."sanGetuKinkaku") AS "sanGetuKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."gennenSuyijiKinkaku") AS "gennenSuyijiKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."kanendoKinkaku") AS "kanendoKinkaku", SUM(koumokuSyoukeyi."sayisyutuKanpuKinkaku") AS "sayisyutuKanpuKinkaku" FROM "TmpKoumokuSyoukeyi_Ichi" AS koumokuSyoukeyi GROUP BY koumokuSyoukeyi."choshuHouhou"

select.id: get項目合計一時テーブルデータの取得

mapper.select: SELECT koumokuGoukey."hokenryoDankai", sum(koumokuGoukey."yoGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "yoGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."goGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "goGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."rokuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "rokuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."nanaGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "nanaGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."hatiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "hatiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."kyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "kyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."jyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "jyuGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."jyuitiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "jyuitiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."jyuniGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "jyuniGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."itiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "itiGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."niGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "niGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."sanGetuNinsuuGoukeyi") AS "sanGetuNinsuuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."現年随時の人数合計") AS "現年随時の人数合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."過年度の人数合計") AS "過年度の人数合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."歳出還付の人数合計") AS "歳出還付の人数合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."該当段階の人数合計") AS "該当段階の人数合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."総人数合計") AS "総人数合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."yoGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "yoGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."goGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "goGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."rokuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "rokuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."nanaGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "nanaGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."hatiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "hatiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."kyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "kyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."jyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "jyuGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."jyuitiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "jyuitiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."jyuniGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "jyuniGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."itiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "itiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."niGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "niGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."sanGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "sanGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."現年随時の金額合計") AS "現年随時の金額合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."過年度の金額合計") AS "過年度の金額合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."歳出還付の金額合計") AS "歳出還付の金額合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."該当段階の金額合計") AS "該当段階の金額合計" FROM "TmpKoumokuGoukey_Ichi" AS koumokuGoukey WHERE koumokuGoukey."hokenryoDankai" <> '合計' GROUP BY koumokuGoukey."hokenryoDankai"

"jyuitiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."jyuniGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "jyuniGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."itiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "itiGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."niGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "niGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."sanGetuKinkakuGoukeyi") AS "sanGetuKinkakuGoukeyi", sum(koumokuGoukey."現年随時の金額合計") AS "現年随時の金額合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."過年度の金額合計") AS "過年度の金額合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."歳出還付の金額合計") AS "歳出還付の金額合計", sum(koumokuGoukey."該当段階の金額合計") AS "該当段階の金額合計" FROM "TmpKoumokuGoukey_Ichi" AS koumokuGoukey WHERE koumokuGoukey."hokenryoDankai" <> '合計'

SELECT fuka."choteiNendo" AS "fuka_choteiNendo", fuka."fukaNendo" AS "fuka_fukaNendo", fuka."tsuchishoNo" AS "fuka_tsuchishoNo", fuka."rirekiNo" AS "fuka_rirekiNo", fuka."hihokenshaNo" AS "fuka_hihokenshaNo", COALESCE(fuka."hokenryoDankai2",fuka."hokenryoDankai1") AS "fuka_hokenryoDankai", fuka."tkSaishutsuKampuGaku" AS "fuka_tkSaishutsuKampuGaku", fuka."fuSaishutsuKampuGaku" AS "fuka_fuSaishutsuKampuGaku", kibetsu."choshuHouhou" AS "kibetsu_choshuHouhou", kibetsu."ki" AS "kibetsu_ki", kibetsu."choteiId" AS "kibetsu_choteiId", choteiKyotsu."choteigaku" AS "choteiKyotsu_choteigaku" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS fuka INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS kibetsu ON fuka."choteiNendo" = kibetsu."choteiNendo" AND fuka."fukaNendo" = kibetsu."fukaNendo" AND fuka."tsuchishoNo" = kibetsu."tsuchishoNo" AND fuka."rirekiNo" = kibetsu."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" choteiKyotsu ON kibetsu."choteiId" = choteiKyotsu."choteiId" INNER JOIN ( SELECT T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo", MAX(T."rirekiNo") AS "rirekiNo", T."hihokenshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS T WHERE T."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND T."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND T."choteiNichiji" <= #{choteiKijunNichiji} GROUP BY T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo", T."hihokenshaNo") AS fukaT ON fukaT."choteiNendo" = fuka."choteiNendo" AND fukaT."fukaNendo" = fuka."fukaNendo" AND fukaT."tsuchishoNo" = fuka."tsuchishoNo" AND fukaT."rirekiNo" = fuka."rirekiNo" AND fukaT."hihokenshaNo" = fuka."hihokenshaNo" WHERE fuka."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND fuka."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND fuka."choteiNichiji" <= #{choteiKijunNichiji} ORDER BY fuka."tsuchishoNo"

select.id: get過年度のデータの取得

mapper.select: SELECT fuka."choteiNendo" AS "fuka_choteiNendo", fuka."fukaNendo" AS "fuka_fukaNendo", fuka."tsuchishoNo" AS "fuka_tsuchishoNo", fuka."rirekiNo" AS "fuka_rirekiNo", fuka."hihokenshaNo" AS "fuka_hihokenshaNo", COALESCE(fuka."hokenryoDankai2",fuka."hokenryoDankai1") AS "fuka_hokenryoDankai", fuka."tkSaishutsuKampuGaku" AS "fuka_tkSaishutsuKampuGaku", fuka."fuSaishutsuKampuGaku" AS "fuka_fuSaishutsuKampuGaku", kibetsu."choshuHouhou" AS "kibetsu_choshuHouhou", kibetsu."ki" AS "kibetsu_ki", kibetsu."choteiId" AS "kibetsu_choteiId", choteiKyotsu."choteigaku" AS "choteiKyotsu_choteigaku" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS fuka INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS kibetsu ON fuka."choteiNendo" = kibetsu."choteiNendo" AND fuka."fukaNendo" = kibetsu."fukaNendo" AND fuka."tsuchishoNo" = kibetsu."tsuchishoNo" AND fuka."rirekiNo" = kibetsu."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" choteiKyotsu ON kibetsu."choteiId" = choteiKyotsu."choteiId" INNER JOIN ( SELECT T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo", MAX(T."rirekiNo") AS "rirekiNo", T."hihokenshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS T WHERE T."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND (T."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減1} OR T."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減2}) AND T."choteiNichiji" <= #{choteiKijunNichiji} GROUP BY T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo", T."hihokenshaNo") AS fukaT ON fukaT."choteiNendo" = fuka."choteiNendo" AND (fukaT."fukaNendo" = (CAST(CAST(fuka."choteiNendo" AS integer ) -1 AS character(4))) OR fukaT."fukaNendo" = (CAST(CAST(fuka."choteiNendo" AS integer ) -2 AS character(4)))) AND fukaT."tsuchishoNo" = fuka."tsuchishoNo" AND fukaT."rirekiNo" = fuka."rirekiNo" AND fukaT."hihokenshaNo" = fuka."hihokenshaNo" WHERE fuka."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND (fuka."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減1} OR fuka."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減2}) AND fuka."choteiNichiji" <= #{choteiKijunNichiji} ORDER BY fuka."tsuchishoNo"

SELECT DISTINCT ON(fuka."hihokenshaNo") fuka."hihokenshaNo" AS "fuka_hihokenshaNo", fuka."choteiNendo" AS "fuka_choteiNendo", fuka."fukaNendo" AS "fuka_fukaNendo", fuka."tsuchishoNo" AS "fuka_tsuchishoNo", fuka."rirekiNo" AS "fuka_rirekiNo", fuka."hihokenshaNo" AS "fuka_hihokenshaNo", COALESCE(fuka."hokenryoDankai2",fuka."hokenryoDankai1") AS "fuka_hokenryoDankai", kibetsu."choshuHouhou" AS "kibetsu_choshuHouhou", kibetsu."ki" AS "kibetsu_ki", kibetsu."choteiId" AS "kibetsu_choteiId", choteiKyotsu."choteigaku" AS "choteiKyotsu_choteigaku" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS fuka INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS kibetsu ON fuka."choteiNendo" = kibetsu."choteiNendo" AND fuka."fukaNendo" = kibetsu."fukaNendo" AND fuka."tsuchishoNo" = kibetsu."tsuchishoNo" AND fuka."rirekiNo" = kibetsu."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" AS HihokenshaDaicho ON fuka."hihokenshaNo" = HihokenshaDaicho."hihokenshaNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" AS choteiKyotsu ON kibetsu."choteiId" = choteiKyotsu."choteiId" INNER JOIN ( SELECT T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo", MAX(T."rirekiNo") AS "rirekiNo", T."hihokenshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS T WHERE T."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND T."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND T."choteiNichiji" <= #{choteiKijunNichiji} GROUP BY T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo", T."hihokenshaNo") AS fukaT ON fukaT."choteiNendo" = fuka."choteiNendo" AND fukaT."fukaNendo" = fuka."fukaNendo" AND fukaT."tsuchishoNo" = fuka."tsuchishoNo" AND fukaT."rirekiNo" = fuka."rirekiNo" AND fukaT."hihokenshaNo" = fuka."hihokenshaNo" WHERE fuka."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND fuka."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND fuka."choteiNichiji" <= #{choteiKijunNichiji} AND (fuka."hokenryoDankai1" IS NULL AND fuka."hokenryoDankai2" IS NULL AND HihokenshaDaicho."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" >= #{調定年度0401} AND HihokenshaDaicho."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" <= #{調定年度0430}) OR ((fuka."hokenryoDankai1" IS NOT NULL OR fuka."hokenryoDankai2" IS NOT NULL) AND HihokenshaDaicho."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" >= #{調定年度0401} AND HihokenshaDaicho."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" <= #{調定年度0430}) ORDER BY fuka."hihokenshaNo", fuka."tsuchishoNo"

SELECT kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_fukaNendo", COUNT(kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo") AS "kayigoJyoho_niGetuNinsu", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai" AS "kayigoJyoho_hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou" AS "kayigoJyoho_choshuHouhou", SUM(kayigoJyoho."choteigaku") AS "kayigoJyoho_niGetuKinkaku" FROM "TmpKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho WHERE kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo" IN( SELECT sikakuJyoukyou."hihokenshaNo" FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS sikakuJyoukyou WHERE sikakuJyoukyou."niGetuSikakuumuFlg" = true ) AND kayigoJyoho."getu" = '02' AND kayigoJyoho."dankaiFumeyiFlg" = false GROUP BY kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo"

SELECT kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_fukaNendo", COUNT(kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo") AS "kayigoJyoho_sanGetuNinsu", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai" AS "kayigoJyoho_hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou" AS "kayigoJyoho_choshuHouhou", SUM(kayigoJyoho."choteigaku") AS "kayigoJyoho_sanGetuKinkaku" FROM "TmpKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho WHERE kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo" IN( SELECT sikakuJyoukyou."hihokenshaNo" FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS sikakuJyoukyou WHERE sikakuJyoukyou."sanGetuSikakuumuFlg" = true ) AND kayigoJyoho."getu" = '03' AND kayigoJyoho."dankaiFumeyiFlg" = false GROUP BY kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo"

SELECT kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_fukaNendo", COUNT(DISTINCT kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo") AS "kayigoJyoho_gennenSuyijiNinsu", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai" AS "kayigoJyoho_hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou" AS "kayigoJyoho_choshuHouhou", SUM(kayigoJyoho."choteigaku") AS "kayigoJyoho_gennenSuyijiKinkaku" FROM "TmpKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho WHERE kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo" IN( SELECT sikakuJyoukyou."hihokenshaNo" FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS sikakuJyoukyou ) AND kayigoJyoho."getu" = '随' AND kayigoJyoho."dankaiFumeyiFlg" = false GROUP BY kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo"

SELECT kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_fukaNendo", COUNT(kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo") AS "kayigoJyoho_kanendoNinsu", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai" AS "kayigoJyoho_hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou" AS "kayigoJyoho_choshuHouhou", SUM(kayigoJyoho."choteigaku") AS "kayigoJyoho_kanendoKinkaku" FROM "TmpKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho WHERE kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND (kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減1} OR kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減2}) AND kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo" IN( SELECT sikakuJyoukyou."hihokenshaNo" FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS sikakuJyoukyou ) GROUP BY kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo"

select.id: get特別徴収歳出還付の人数金額

mapper.select: SELECT kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_fukaNendo", COUNT(kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo") AS "kayigoJyoho_sayisyutuKanpuNinsu", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai" AS "kayigoJyoho_hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou" AS "kayigoJyoho_choshuHouhou", SUM(kayigoJyoho."tkSaishutsuKampuGaku") AS "kayigoJyoho_sayisyutuKanpuKinkaku" FROM "TmpKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho WHERE kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo" IN( SELECT sikakuJyoukyou."hihokenshaNo" FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS sikakuJyoukyou ) AND kayigoJyoho."tkSaishutsuKampuGaku" <> '0' AND kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou" = '1' GROUP BY kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo"

mapper.select: SELECT kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_fukaNendo", COUNT(kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo") AS "kayigoJyoho_sayisyutuKanpuNinsu", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai" AS "kayigoJyoho_hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou" AS "kayigoJyoho_choshuHouhou", SUM(kayigoJyoho."fuSaishutsuKampuGaku") AS "kayigoJyoho_sayisyutuKanpuKinkaku" FROM "TmpKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho WHERE kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo" IN( SELECT sikakuJyoukyou."hihokenshaNo" FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS sikakuJyoukyou ) AND kayigoJyoho."fuSaishutsuKampuGaku" <> '0' AND kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou" = '2' GROUP BY kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo"

SELECT kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_fukaNendo", COUNT(kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo") AS "kayigoJyoho_fumeNinsu", kayigoJyoho."getu" AS "kayigoJyoho_getu", kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou" AS "kayigoJyoho_choshuHouhou", SUM(kayigoJyoho."choteigaku") AS "kayigoJyoho_fumeKinkaku" FROM "TmpKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho WHERE kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo" IN( SELECT sikakuJyoukyou."hihokenshaNo" FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS sikakuJyoukyou ) AND kayigoJyoho."dankaiFumeyiFlg" = true GROUP BY kayigoJyoho."choshuHouhou", kayigoJyoho."getu", kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo"

select.id: get減免部分の人数と金額

mapper.select: SELECT kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_fukaNendo", COUNT(kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo") AS "kayigoJyoho_kanendoNinsu", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai" AS "kayigoJyoho_hokenryoDankai", SUM(kayigoJyoho."gemmenGaku") AS "kayigoJyoho_kanendoGemmenGaku" FROM "TmpGemmenKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho WHERE kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND (kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減1} OR kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減2}) AND kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo" IN( SELECT sikakuJyoukyou."hihokenshaNo" FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS sikakuJyoukyou ) GROUP BY kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo"

select.id: get減免部分合計の人数と金額

mapper.select: SELECT kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" AS "kayigoJyoho_fukaNendo", COUNT(kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo") AS "kayigoJyoho_kanendoNinsuGoukeyi", kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai" AS "kayigoJyoho_hokenryoDankai", SUM(kayigoJyoho."gemmenGaku") AS "kayigoJyoho_kanendoGemmenGakuGoukeyi" FROM "TmpGemmenKayigoJyoho_Ichi" AS kayigoJyoho WHERE kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND (kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{choteiNendo} OR kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減1} OR kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo" = #{調定年度減2}) AND kayigoJyoho."hihokenshaNo" IN( SELECT sikakuJyoukyou."hihokenshaNo" FROM "TmpSikakuJyoukyou_Ichi" AS sikakuJyoukyou ) GROUP BY kayigoJyoho."hokenryoDankai", kayigoJyoho."choteiNendo", kayigoJyoho."fukaNendo"

select.id: get減免部分過年度の人数合計と金額合計

mapper.select: SELECT SUM(GemmenJyoho."hokenryoDankaiKanendoNinsu") AS "gemmenJyoho_hokenryoDankaiKanendoNinsu", SUM(GemmenJyoho."hoDankaiKanendoGemmenGaku") AS "gemmenJyoho_hokenryoDankaiKanendoGemmenGaku", SUM(GemmenJyoho."hoDankaiKanendoNinsuGoukeyi") AS "gemmenJyoho_hokenryoDankaiKanendoNinsuGoukeyi", SUM(GemmenJyoho."hoDankaiKanendoGemenGakuGoukei") AS "gemmenJyoho_hokenryoDankaiKanendoGemmenGakuGoukeyi" FROM "TmpGemmenJyoho_Ichi" AS GemmenJyoho WHERE GemmenJyoho."choteiNendo" IS NULL AND GemmenJyoho."fukaNendo" IS NULL

select.id: get該当段階の過年度の人数と金額合計

mapper.select: SELECT GemmenJyoho."hokenryoDankai" AS "gemmenJyoho_hokenryoDankai", SUM(GemmenJyoho."hokenryoDankaiKanendoNinsu") AS "gemmenJyoho_hokenryoDankaiKanendoNinsu", SUM(GemmenJyoho."hoDankaiKanendoGemmenGaku") AS "gemmenJyoho_hokenryoDankaiKanendoGemmenGaku", SUM(GemmenJyoho."hoDankaiKanendoNinsuGoukeyi") AS "gemmenJyoho_hokenryoDankaiKanendoNinsuGoukeyi", SUM(GemmenJyoho."hoDankaiKanendoGemenGakuGoukei") AS "gemmenJyoho_hokenryoDankaiKanendoGemmenGakuGoukeyi" FROM "TmpGemmenJyoho_Ichi" AS GemmenJyoho GROUP BY GemmenJyoho."hokenryoDankai"
